nextcloud_file_added: A user added a file to Nextcloud in a project
nextcloud_file_removed: A user removed a file from Nextcloud in a project
nextcloud_file_updated: A user updated a file in Nextcloud in a project
nextcloud_folder_created: A user created a folder in Nextcloud in a project
nextcloud_folder_selected: A user linked a Nextcloud folder in a project
nextcloud_node_authorized: A user authorized the Nextcloud addon for a project
nextcloud_node_deauthorized: A user deauthorized the Nextcloud addon for a project
nextcloud_node_deauthorized_no_user: Nextcloud addon for a project deauthorized
